channel.title: Overall Best XI on Blog of Cricket Premee
channel.description: Recent content in Overall Best XI on Blog of Cricket Premee

item.title: Best XI of the Nepal Premier League 2024/25
item.description:
The inaugural season of the Siddhartha Bank Nepal Premier League 2024/25 showcased stellar performances across teams. After much deliberation, here’s our Best Overall XI, featuring players who excelled with their consistent displays throughout the tournament.

Key criteria for selection:

  • A fieldable team with a good ratio of batsmen, bowlers, , all-rounders, and a wicketkeeper.
  • No restrictions on the number of overseas players (check out the Best Fieldable XI for the best XI team with 4 overseas players).

Overall Best XI

1. Andries Gous (Opener/wicketkeepr, Pokhara Avengers, overseas)

  • Batting: 224 runs in 6 innings, Avg 44.80, SR 164.70, HS 104*

Andries Gous became the first player to score a century in the NPL when he scored a thunderous 104* off 55 balls during the Avengers’ chase against the Lions in a dominant display of power-hitting. He scored lots of runs in the tournament and he scored them at a blistering pace.
